Content: I am having trouble identifying who built this motorcycle. I was told it was built by Vance and Heinz authorized dealership. Any information would be greatly appreciated. It was purchased in 1996 the middle front fairing is unlike ant other i have seen built from new as a drag bike. It was returned to steet. Came with rear section and wheelbars. Any help anyone can give me I greatly appreciate. Thank you
